attributes.review:
Do. Not. Get. This. App. It is so unhelpful and honestly just a waste of time. A friend recommended it to me and I was rather excited to have an outlet to support this "great man". Overall disappointed with the performance of the app. Runs at like -1 fps at best. 
Don't get this app, and waste your time with literally anything else.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to try and keep up with my presidents campaign and when I downloaded this app my phone started acting up and dying at 77% and my phone kept glitching and just my whole phone turned upside down. So I have now deleted the app and my phone is now normal. I HIGHLY DONT recommend this app.
attributes.title: NOT A GOOD APP.

attributes.title: For Tiktok

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to see what trump has planned. Within three minutes of being in the app, it crashed. I tried to get back on but it kept crashing. How does a Trump want to make America great again if he cannot get right people to work on his app?!
attributes.title: Disappointment

attributes.review: When I opened the app, the walls started melting and my dogs started throwing up and my cats started howling I got an instant migraine my skin turned bright orange and my phone imploded and then I got diarrhea and because everything was melting i didnâ€™t have any toilet paper so I was forced to use my favorite pair of chonies. I do not recommend.
attributes.title: Nope

attributes.review: I was enjoying this app until it had a pop up advertisement telling you to kill your family. I was very disturbed but what was even worse was that my six year old sister was looking at my phone at that time. She is traumatized. Do not download.
attributes.title: So disturbing and horrible
